features: 【High-Speed Charging & Dual Port Design】Block two in one - USB-A and USB-C ports to charge two devices simultaneously at high speed. Minimize waiting time and frees you from messy chargers with various interfaces.

【MFi Certified 】 With the MFi Chip, the USB-C to lightning cord equips automatic chip recognition function. The MFi Certification ensures 100% flawless compatibility with devices. No more trigger warning messages.

【Superior Safety Fast Charger】20W iPhone Charger has multipotent safety system ensures complete protection for your lightning devices. The UL certified wall charger built-in over-voltage protection, features a stable voltage. the lightning cable built-in smart chip to match the current required by devices automatically.

【Applicable Equipment】 Works With for iPhone 14/14 Pro/ 14Pro Max/13/13 Mini/13 Pro/12/12Pro/12 Pro Max/12 Mini/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS Max/XS/X/XR/8 Plus/8, iPad Pro/ iPad Air/ iPad, AirPods Pro. Standrad Charging Speed works with iPhone 7/7 Plus/6s/6s Plus/6/6 Plus/SE/5s/5/5c

【What you will get】3x 6FT Cable and 3 x Dual port (PD USB C 3.0 & USB A) wall charger. We offer 7x24 hours of friendly customer service Just contact us and we can provide the brand with additional worry-free product support and a free customer service store!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exemplary Efficiency and Elegance
reviews.reviewText: I am elated to share my experience with the Fast Dual Charger for iPhones, a gem I acquired from a reputable vendor on Amazon. This charger embodies a blend of unparalleled speed and remarkable convenience, redefining the standard for charging solutions.Noteworthy is its lightning-fast charging prowess, enabling a seamless dual-device charge with no compromise on speed or quality. The sleek design not only complements the aesthetics of my space but also provides an efficient, compact solution that simplifies my charging routine.The seamless compatibility with a range of iPhone models underscores its adaptability, making it an indispensable asset in this tech-centric era. I have observed a significant reduction in charging time, ensuring that my devices are always at the ready for any task or adventure.Moreover, the durability and reliability of this charger stand out. The robust build exudes quality, assuring me of a long-term, dependable charging solution that transcends mere functionality.To add, the vendor's service was commendable, providing swift delivery and impeccable packaging, reflecting a commitment to customer satisfaction.This Fast Dual Charger for iPhones is a paragon of innovation and functionality, a testament to modern charging needs. I highly recommend this product to anyone seeking an efficient, elegant, and reliable charging solution for their precious Apple devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product! Must have item!
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't be more pleased with this iPhone charger! The fact that it's Apple MFi certified provides the peace of mind that it's not only high-quality but also safe for my devices.The 20W PD+QC3.0 dual-port design is a game-changer. Charging my iPhone is faster than ever, and having an extra port for another device is incredibly convenient. No more waiting around for my devices to charge.The build quality is top-notch, and the cable feels robust and durable. I've used other chargers that seem flimsy in comparison.Overall, I highly recommend this charger. It's efficient, reliable, and worth every penny. If you're looking for a fast and safe charging solution for your Apple devices, look no further!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are my favorite chargers now. It’s my second set I bought because they’re easily my fav I love that the box comes with the dual port so I can charger 2 things at once. Very durable and the length is perfect. Perfect for the car when you’re in the back set and you’re charging your phone from the front.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5-Star Review: Efficient and Reliable Charging Solution
reviews.reviewText: Having recently purchased the iPhone Charger Fast Charging set, I've been nothing short of impressed. The 3-pack offers exceptional value for the price, especially considering the fast charging capabilities. The dual port design has been a lifesaver, allowing me to charge two devices at once without any hiccups, and with the added bonus of minimal waiting time.Additionally, the Apple MFi certification ensures that compatibility and safety are guaranteed. I've found this feature particularly beneficial, as it removes any apprehensions I might have about the quality or reliability of the charger with my Apple devices. Furthermore, the automatic chip recognition functionality ensures seamless and efficient charging without any pesky warning messages.Moreover, the package includes 3 long 6FT cables, which offer flexibility in terms of where I can place my devices while charging. The added convenience of this cannot be overstated. Plus, knowing that the charger comes with UL certification for superior safety and features built-in over-voltage protection provides an extra layer of peace of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: These function perfectly, the material used in the cables feels like cheaper quality material but I’ve been using them for 2 months now without a single issue, for the price you can’t go wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly, great deal. I like that the block has two outlets as well so ucan charge a phone and watch or two phones if u have a c & b head.
